description: Creates tags for a budget or budget action resource.

parameters.name: ResourceARN
parameters.description: The unique identifier for the resource.

parameters.name: ResourceTags
parameters.description: The tags associated with the resource. (dict) --- The tag structure that contains a tag key and value. The key that's associated with the tag. The value that's associated with the tag.

nested_params.name: Key
nested_params.description: The key that's associated with the tag.

nested_params.name: Value
nested_params.description: The value that's associated with the tag.
